marklogic.body:

If so, how can they know when they were not there?
As usual, we see with Liberals that they have a lynch mob mentality. Â They make decisions out of emotion and prejudice, rather than facts and objectivity.
First, most people thought the shooter was White, because they WANTED it to be a White man.
Then...
Most people assumed that the shooter was a Cold back stabbing killer who got free, because they WANTED a White system to beÂ responsibleÂ for the "injustice."
This entire drama just demonstrates that what the "Hoodie people" want is a race war, but they are just too cowardly to just launch one out of their own will....because their wills are weak.
â€œTo exercise power costs effort and demands courage. That is why so many fail to assert rights to which they are perfectly entitled -- because a right is a kind of power but they are too lazy or too cowardly to exercise it. The virtues which cloak these faults are called patience and forbearance.â€ - Nietzsche
I must say, IF this side of the story is true, then I am Glad that Trayvon is dead, and justice was served.
